name: v3.2.9
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.2.9. Please see [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#v329-2017-10-06) for highlighted changes.

Upgrade guide from v3.1+ to v3.2+ can be found at [upgrade 3.2](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/upgrades/upgrade_3_2.md).

The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key).

Please visit [Supported platforms](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/supported-platform.md) to check etcd support status for common architectures and operating systems.

##### Fixed(Security)

- Compile with [Go 1.8.4](https://groups.google.com/d/msg/golang-nuts/sHfMg4gZNps/a-HDgDDDAAAJ)
- [golang/crypto@6c586e1](https://github.com/golang/crypto/commit/6c586e17d90a7d08bbbc4069984180dce3b04117),[#8649](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8649) vendor: update 'golang.org/x/crypto/bcrypt'
- [#8445](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8445),[#8651](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8651) embed: fix HTTPS + DNS SRV discovery

##### Getting started

###### Linux

```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.9

# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-download-test && mkdir -p /tmp/etcd-download-test

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xzvf /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -C /tmp/etcd-download-test --strip-components=1

/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd --version
<<COMMENT
etcd Version: 3.2.9
Git SHA: f1d7dd8
Go Version: go1.8.4
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
COMMENT

ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl version
<<COMMENT
etcdctl version: 3.2.9
API version: 3.2
COMMENT
```

```bash
# start a local etcd server
/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd

# write,read to etcd
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 put foo bar
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 get foo
```

###### macOS (Darwin)

```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.9

# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-download-test && mkdir -p /tmp/etcd-download-test

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
unzip /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -d /tmp
mv /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64/* /tmp/etcd-download-test

/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd --version
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl version
```

###### Docker

etcd now uses [`gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd`](https://gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd) (**WARNING: `quay.io/coreos/etcd` has been deprecated**).

```
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-data.tmp && \
  docker rmi gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.2.9 || true && \
  docker run \
  -p 2379:2379 \
  -p 2380:2380 \
  --name etcd-v3.2.9 \
  --volume=/tmp/etcd-data.tmp:/etcd-data \
  gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.2.9 \
  /usr/local/bin/etcd \
  --name s1 \
  --data-dir /etcd-data \
  --listen-client-urls http://0.0.0.0:2379 \
  --advertise-client-urls http://0.0.0.0:2379 \
  --listen-peer-urls http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
  --initial-advertise-peer-urls http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
  --initial-cluster s1=http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
  --initial-cluster-token tkn \
  --initial-cluster-state new

docker exec etcd-v3.2.9 /bin/sh -c "/usr/local/bin/etcd --version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.9 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.9 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl endpoint health"

docker exec etcd-v3.2.9 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl put foo bar"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.9 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl get foo"
```

For more details, please check [Docker guide](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/container.md#docker).

name: v3.2.8
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.2.8. Please see [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#v328-2017-09-29) for highlighted changes.

Upgrade guide from v3.1+ to v3.2+ can be found at [upgrade 3.2](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/upgrades/upgrade_3_2.md).

The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key).

Please visit [Supported platforms](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/supported-platform.md) to check etcd support status for common architectures and operating systems.

##### Bug fixes

- [#8515](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8515),[#8519](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8519) client: fail over to next endpoint on oneshot failure
- [#8478](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8478),[#8552](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8552) grpcproxy: respect KeysOnly flag
- [#8888](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8580) docs: remove link-breaking space

##### Getting started

###### Linux

```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.8

# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-download-test && mkdir -p /tmp/etcd-download-test

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xzvf /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -C /tmp/etcd-download-test --strip-components=1

/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd --version
<<COMMENT
etcd Version: 3.2.8
Git SHA: e211fb6
Go Version: go1.8.3
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
COMMENT

ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl version
<<COMMENT
etcdctl version: 3.2.8
API version: 3.2
COMMENT
```

```bash
# start a local etcd server
/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd

# write,read to etcd
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 put foo bar
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 get foo
```

###### macOS (Darwin)

```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.8

# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-download-test && mkdir -p /tmp/etcd-download-test

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
unzip /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -d /tmp
mv /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64/* /tmp/etcd-download-test

/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd --version
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl version
```

###### Docker

etcd now uses [`gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd`](https://gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd).
`quay.io/coreos/etcd` has been deprecated.

```
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-data.tmp && \
  docker rmi gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.2.8 || true && \
  docker run \
  -p 2379:2379 \
  -p 2380:2380 \
  --name etcd-v3.2.8 \
  --volume=/tmp/etcd-data.tmp:/etcd-data \
  gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.2.8 \
  /usr/local/bin/etcd \
  --name s1 \
  --data-dir /etcd-data \
  --listen-client-urls http://0.0.0.0:2379 \
  --advertise-client-urls http://0.0.0.0:2379 \
  --listen-peer-urls http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
  --initial-advertise-peer-urls http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
  --initial-cluster s1=http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
  --initial-cluster-token tkn \
  --initial-cluster-state new

docker exec etcd-v3.2.8 /bin/sh -c "/usr/local/bin/etcd --version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.8 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.8 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl endpoint health"

docker exec etcd-v3.2.8 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl put foo bar"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.8 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl get foo"
```

For more details, please check [Docker guide](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/container.md#docker).

name: v3.2.7
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.2.7. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

Upgrade guide from v3.1+ to v3.2+ can be found at [upgrade 3.2](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/upgrades/upgrade_3_2.md).

The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key).

Please visit [Supported platforms](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/supported-platform.md) to check etcd support status for common architectures and operating systems.

##### Bug fixes

- [#8439](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8439) concurrency: retry snapshot serializable stm if writes since first header rev
- [#8406](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8406),[#8306](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8306),[#8442](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8442) concurrent auth ops don't cause old rev 

##### Getting started

###### Linux

```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.7

# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-download-test && mkdir -p /tmp/etcd-download-test

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xzvf /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -C /tmp/etcd-download-test --strip-components=1

/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd --version
<<COMMENT
etcd Version: 3.2.7
Git SHA: bb66589
Go Version: go1.8.3
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
COMMENT

ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl version
<<COMMENT
etcdctl version: 3.2.7
API version: 3.2
COMMENT
```

```bash
# start a local etcd server
/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd

# write,read to etcd
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 put foo bar
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 get foo
```

###### macOS (Darwin)

```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.7

# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-download-test && mkdir -p /tmp/etcd-download-test

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
unzip /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -d /tmp
mv /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64/* /tmp/etcd-download-test

/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd --version
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl version
```

###### Docker

Starting from `v3.2.5`, we are switching to `gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd`.
`quay.io/coreos/etcd` is being deprecated in future versions.

```
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-data.tmp && \
  docker run \
  --rm \
  -p 2379:2379 \
  -p 2380:2380 \
  --name etcd-v3.2.7 \
  --volume=/tmp/etcd-data.tmp:/etcd-data \
  gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.2.7 \
  /usr/local/bin/etcd \
  --name my-etcd-1 \
  --data-dir /etcd-data \
  --listen-client-urls http://0.0.0.0:2379 \
  --advertise-client-urls http://0.0.0.0:2379 \
  --listen-peer-urls http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
  --initial-advertise-peer-urls http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
  --initial-cluster my-etcd-1=http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
  --initial-cluster-token my-etcd-token \
  --initial-cluster-state new

docker exec etcd-v3.2.7 /bin/sh -c "/usr/local/bin/etcd --version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.7 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.7 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl endpoint health"

docker exec etcd-v3.2.7 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl put foo bar"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.7 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl get foo"
```

For more details, please check [Docker guide](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/container.md#docker).

name: v3.2.6
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.2.6. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

Upgrade guide from v3.1+ to v3.2+ can be found at [upgrade 3.2](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/upgrades/upgrade_3_2.md).

The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key).

Please visit [Supported platforms](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/supported-platform.md) to check etcd support status for common architectures and operating systems.

##### Bug fixes

- [#8402](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8402),[#8404](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8404) embed: add 'enable-pprof' tag for config file
- [#8383](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8383),[#8414](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8414) embed: associate peer serve() listener with corresponding peer
- [#8388](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8388),[#8390](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8390) mvcc: reset keys gauge on restore
- [#8411](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8411),[#8427](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8427) mvcc: sending events after restore

##### Getting started

###### Linux

```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.6

# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-download-test && mkdir -p /tmp/etcd-download-test

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xzvf /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -C /tmp/etcd-download-test --strip-components=1

/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd --version
<<COMMENT
etcd Version: 3.2.6
Git SHA: 9d43462
Go Version: go1.8.3
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
COMMENT

ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl version
<<COMMENT
etcdctl version: 3.2.6
API version: 3.2
COMMENT
```

```bash
# start a local etcd server
/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd

# write,read to etcd
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 put foo bar
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 get foo
```

###### macOS (Darwin)

```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.6

# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-download-test && mkdir -p /tmp/etcd-download-test

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
unzip /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -d /tmp
mv /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64/* /tmp/etcd-download-test

/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd --version
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl version
```

###### Docker

Starting from `v3.2.5`, we are switching to `gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd`.
`quay.io/coreos/etcd` is being deprecated in future versions.

```
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-data.tmp && \
  docker run \
  --rm \
  -p 2379:2379 \
  -p 2380:2380 \
  --name etcd-v3.2 \
  --volume=/tmp/etcd-data.tmp:/etcd-data \
  gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.2 \
  /usr/local/bin/etcd \
  --name my-etcd-1 \
  --data-dir /etcd-data \
  --listen-client-urls http://0.0.0.0:2379 \
  --advertise-client-urls http://0.0.0.0:2379 \
  --listen-peer-urls http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
  --initial-advertise-peer-urls http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
  --initial-cluster my-etcd-1=http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
  --initial-cluster-token my-etcd-token \
  --initial-cluster-state new

docker exec etcd-v3.2 /bin/sh -c "/usr/local/bin/etcd --version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl endpoint health"

docker exec etcd-v3.2 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl put foo bar"
docker exec etcd-v3.2 /bin/sh -c "ETCDCTL_API=3 /usr/local/bin/etcdctl get foo"
```

For more details, please check [Docker guide](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/container.md#docker).

name: v3.2.5
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.2.5. This is primarily a bug fix release, backward-compatible with all previous v3.2+ releases. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

Upgrade guide from v3.1+ to v3.2+ can be found at [upgrade 3.2](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/upgrades/upgrade_3_2.md).

The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key).

Please visit [Supported platforms](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/supported-platform.md) to check etcd support status for common architectures and operating systems.

##### Bug fixes

- [#8167](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8167),[#8236](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8236) *: move v2http handlers without /v2 prefix to etcdhttp
- [#8268](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8268),[#8318](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8318),[#8281](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8281) transport: use reverse lookup to match wildcard DNS SAN
- [#8295](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8295),[#8342](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8342) ctlv3: exit non-zero on unhealthy ep command
- [#8350](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8350) ctlv3/command: remove double-quote typos in fields printer
- [#8366](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8366) grpcproxy: forward PrevKv flag in Put

##### Getting started

###### Linux

```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.5

# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-download-test && mkdir -p /tmp/etcd-download-test

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xzvf /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -C /tmp/etcd-download-test --strip-components=1

/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd --version
<<COMMENT
etcd Version: 3.2.5
Git SHA: d0d1a87
Go Version: go1.8.3
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
COMMENT

ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl version
<<COMMENT
etcdctl version: 3.2.5
API version: 3.2
COMMENT
```

```bash
# start a local etcd server
/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd

# write,read to etcd
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 put foo bar
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 get foo
```

###### macOS (Darwin)

```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.5

# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-download-test && mkdir -p /tmp/etcd-download-test

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
unzip /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -d /tmp
mv /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64/* /tmp/etcd-download-test

/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd --version
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl version
```

###### Docker

Starting from `v3.2.5`, we are switching to `gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd`.
`quay.io/coreos/etcd` will be deprecated *in the future*.

```
# REGISTRY=quay.io/coreos/etcd
REGISTRY=gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd

docker run \
  --rm \
  -p 2379:2379 \
  -p 2380:2380 \
  --name etcd-v3.2 \
  --volume=/tmp/etcd-data:/etcd-data \
  ${REGISTRY}:v3.2 \
  /usr/local/bin/etcd \
  --name my-etcd-1 \
  --data-dir /etcd-data \
  --listen-client-urls http://localhost:2379 \
  --advertise-client-urls http://localhost:2379 \
  --listen-peer-urls http://localhost:2380 \
  --initial-advertise-peer-urls http://localhost:2380 \
  --initial-cluster my-etcd-1=http://localhost:2380 \
  --initial-cluster-token my-etcd-token \
  --initial-cluster-state new \
  --auto-compaction-retention 1

docker exec etcd-v3.2 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcd -version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl endpoint health"

docker exec etcd-v3.2 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl put foo bar"
docker exec etcd-v3.2 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl get --consistency=s foo"
```

For more details, please check [Docker guide](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/container.md#docker).

name: v3.2.4
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.2.4. This is primarily a bug fix release, backward-compatible with all previous v3.2+ releases. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

Upgrade guide from v3.1+ to v3.2+ can be found at [upgrade 3.2](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/upgrades/upgrade_3_2.md).

The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key).

Please visit [Supported platforms](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/supported-platform.md) to check etcd support status for common architectures and operating systems.

##### Bug fixes

- [#8224](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8224),[#8267](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8267) embed: wait up to request-timeout for pending RPCs when closing
- [etcd@1dcae41](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/commit/1dcae41b20d52384020a3e9b39d7a1204c281ac3) grpcproxy: return nil on receiving snapshot EOF

##### Getting started

```bash
# choose either URL

rm -rf /tmp/etcd-download-test && mkdir -p /tmp/etcd-download-test

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz

/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd --version

etcd Version: 3.2.4
Git SHA: c31bec0
Go Version: go1.8.3
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
```

name: v3.2.3

name: v3.1.10
body:

name: v3.2.2
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.2.2. This is primarily a bug fix release, backward-compatible with all previous v3.2+ releases. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

Upgrade guide from v3.1+ to v3.2+ can be found at [upgrade 3.2](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/upgrades/upgrade_3_2.md).

The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key).

Please visit [Supported platforms](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/supported-platform.md) to check etcd support status for common architectures and operating systems.

##### Bug fixes

- [#8069](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8069) benchmark: refactor watch benchmark 
- [#8097](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8097),[#8099](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8099) lease: rate limit revoke runLoop
- [#8146](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8096),[#8149](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8149) lessor: extend leases on promote if expires will be rate limited
- [#7961](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7961),[#8151](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8151),[#8221](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8221) embed: connect json gateway with user-provided listen address
- [#8206](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8206),[#8223](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8223) transport: accept connection if matched IP SAN but no DNS match
- [#8212](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8212),[#8222](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8222) dev-guide: update experimental APIs

##### Getting started

name: v3.2.1
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.2.1. This is primarily a bug fix release, backward-compatible with all previous v3.2+ releases. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.
 
Upgrade guide from v3.1+ to v3.2+ can be found at [upgrade 3.2](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/upgrades/upgrade_3_2.md).
 
The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key).
 
Please visit [Supported platforms](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/supported-platform.md) to check etcd support status for common architectures and operating systems.

##### Bug fixes
 
- [perl-net-etcd#16](https://github.com/hexfusion/perl-net-etcd/issues/16),[#7889](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7889),[#8010](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8010) v3rpc: treat nil txn request op as error
- [#8090](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8090) build-aci: Fix ACI image name
- [#8093](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8093) Documentation/op-guide: fix failed RPC rate, leader election metrics
- [#8080](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8080),[#8120](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8120) mvcc: set db size metric on restore
- [#8048](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8048),[#8127](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8127) mvcc: restore into tree index with one key index
- [#8146](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8146),[#8150](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8150) mvcc: use GaugeFunc metric to load db size when requested
 
##### Getting started
 
###### Linux
 
```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.1
 
# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-download-test && mkdir -p /tmp/etcd-download-test

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xzvf /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -C /tmp/etcd-download-test --strip-components=1

/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd --version
<<COMMENT
etcd Version: 3.2.1
Git SHA: 61fc123
Go Version: go1.8.3
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
COMMENT
 
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl version
<<COMMENT
etcdctl version: 3.2.1
API version: 3.2
COMMENT
```
 
```bash
# start a local etcd server
/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd
 
# write,read to etcd
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 put foo bar
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 get foo
```
 
###### macOS (Darwin)
 
```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.1
 
# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
rm -rf /tmp/etcd-download-test && mkdir -p /tmp/etcd-download-test

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
unzip /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -d /tmp
mv /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64/* /tmp/etcd-download-test

/tmp/etcd-download-test/etcd --version
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/etcd-download-test/etcdctl version
```
 
###### Docker
 
```
docker run \
  --rm \
  -p 2379:2379 \
  -p 2380:2380 \
  --name etcd-v3.2.1 \
  --volume=/tmp/etcd-data:/etcd-data \
  quay.io/coreos/etcd:v3.2.1 \
  /usr/local/bin/etcd \
  --name my-etcd-1 \
  --data-dir /etcd-data \
  --listen-client-urls http://localhost:2379 \
  --advertise-client-urls http://localhost:2379 \
  --listen-peer-urls http://localhost:2380 \
  --initial-advertise-peer-urls http://localhost:2380 \
  --initial-cluster my-etcd-1=http://localhost:2380 \
  --initial-cluster-token my-etcd-token \
  --initial-cluster-state new \
  --auto-compaction-retention 1
 
docker exec etcd-v3.2.1 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcd -version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.1 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.1 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl endpoint health"
 
docker exec etcd-v3.2.1 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl put foo bar"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.1 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl get --consistency=s foo"
```
 
For more details, please check [Docker guide](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/container.md#docker).

name: v3.2.0
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.2.0. Release blog post can be found at [etcd 3.2 announcement](https://coreos.com/blog/etcd-3.2-announcement). Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.
 
Upgrade guide from v3.1+ to v3.2+ can be found at [upgrade 3.2](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/upgrades/upgrade_3_2.md).
 
The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key).
 
##### Enhancements
 
- [#7083](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7083),[#7105](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7105) mvcc: don't block on concurrent reads
- [#7822](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7822),[#7900](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7900) mvcc: chunk reads for restoring
 
##### Breaking changes
 
- [#7305](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7305) lease: LeaseTimeToLive returns TTL=-1 resp on lease not found
- [#7879](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7879) embed: Etcd.Peers field is now []*peerListener
- [#7266](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7266) clientv3: NewFromConfigFile is moved to clientv3/yaml.NewConfig
 
##### Security changes
 
- [#7524](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7524) auth: changes of managing roles and users
- [#7687](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7687) transport: deny incoming peer certs with wrong IP SAN
- [#7767](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7767) transport: resolve DNSNames when SAN checking
- [#7829](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7829) pkg/transport: reload TLS certificates for every client requests
 
##### v0, v2 changes
 
Only affects when migrated from v3.2.0-rc.0, v3.2.0-rc.1
 
- [#7803](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7803) v2http: remove deprecated /v2/machines path
- [#8062](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8062) v2http: put back /v2/machines and mark as non-deprecated
 
##### Other changes
 
- [#7745](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7745) *: add bill of materials
- [#6174](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/6174) *: use Go 1.8+
- [#7560](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7560) Dockerfile-release: add nsswitch.conf into image
- [#7714](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7714) *: add multi-arch support in release binaries
- [#7170](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7170) embed: make v2 endpoint optional
- [#7524](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7525) etcdserver, backend: configure mmap size based on quota
- [#7752](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7752) clientv3: translate WithPrefix() into WithFromKey() for empty key
- [#7692](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7692) vendor: upgrade grpc to 1.2.1
- [#7695](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7695) vendor: upgrade grpc-gateway to v1.2.0
- [#7846](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7846) scripts: annotate with acbuild with supports-systemd-notify
- [#7877](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7877) backend: print snapshotting duration warning every 30s
- [#7892](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7892) backend: add prometheus metric for large snapshot duration
 
##### Notable bug fixes
 
- [#5386#issuecomment](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/5386#issuecomment-302465556),[#8074](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8074) rafthttp: permit very large v2 snapshots
- [#7515](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7515),[#7518](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7518) *: use filepath.Join (fix for Windows)
- [#7789](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8045),[#7809](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8046) fileutil: return immediately if preallocating 0 bytes
- [#7322](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7322),[#7743](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7743) *: use gRPC server GracefulStop
- [#7724](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7724),[#7759](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7759) *: ignore ErrAuthNotEnabled in clientv3 if auth not enabled
- [#7880](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7880),[#7890](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7890) clientv3: Do no stop keep alive loop by server side errors
- [#7348](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7348),[#7394](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7394) *: use machine default host only for default value, 0.0.0.0
- [#7834](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7834),[#7856](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7856) etcdserver: apply() sets consistIndex for any entry type
- [#7628](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7628),[#7876](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7876) etcdserver: renaming db before snapshot persists to wal,snap
- [#7789](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7789),[#7809](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7809) auth: support watch
- [#8071](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8071) etcdserver: use same ReadView for read-only txns
 
##### New features
 
- [#7676](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7676) etcdmain: support SRV discovery for gRPC proxy
- [#7733](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7733) clientv3: let client dial endpoints not in the balancer
- [#7342](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7342) clientv3: version checking
- [#7649](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7649) etcdctl: add a new option --open-ended for unlimited range permission
- [#7591](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7591) etcdctl: add initial check perf command
- [#7983](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7983) etcdctl: support exec on lock
- [#7221](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7221) grpcproxy: support lease coalescing
- [#7549](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7549) namespace proxy
- [#7634](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7634) Election RPC service
- [#4709](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/4709),[#6285](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/6285),[#7444](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7444) gRPC lock service
- [#4378](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/4378),[#7882](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7882) gateway: DNS SRV priority
 
##### New metrics
 
- [#8050](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/8050),[#8064](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8064) etcdserver: add leaseExpired metrics
 
 
##### Getting started
 
###### Linux
 
```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.0
 
# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
rm -rf /tmp/test-etcd && mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xzvf /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -C /tmp/test-etcd --strip-components=1

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version
<<COMMENT
etcd Version: 3.2.0
Git SHA: 66722b1
Go Version: go1.8.3
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
COMMENT
 
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl version
<<COMMENT
etcdctl version: 3.2.0
API version: 3.2
COMMENT
```
 
```bash
# start a local etcd server
/tmp/test-etcd/etcd
 
# write,read to etcd
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 put foo bar
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 get foo
```
 
###### macOS (Darwin)
 
```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.0
 
# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
rm -rf /tmp/test-etcd && mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
unzip /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -d /tmp
mv /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64/* /tmp/test-etcd

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl version
```
 
###### Docker
 
```
docker run \
  --rm \
  -p 2379:2379 \
  -p 2380:2380 \
  --name etcd-v3.2.0 \
  --volume=/tmp/etcd-data:/etcd-data \
  quay.io/coreos/etcd:v3.2.0 \
  /usr/local/bin/etcd \
  --name my-etcd-1 \
  --data-dir /etcd-data \
  --listen-client-urls http://localhost:2379 \
  --advertise-client-urls http://localhost:2379 \
  --listen-peer-urls http://localhost:2380 \
  --initial-advertise-peer-urls http://localhost:2380 \
  --initial-cluster my-etcd-1=http://localhost:2380 \
  --initial-cluster-token my-etcd-token \
  --initial-cluster-state new \
  --auto-compaction-retention 1
 
docker exec etcd-v3.2.0 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcd -version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.0 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.0 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl endpoint health"
 
docker exec etcd-v3.2.0 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl put foo bar"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.0 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl get --consistency=s foo"
```
 
For more details, please check [Docker guide](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/container.md#docker).

name: v3.1.9
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.1.9. This is primarily a bug fix release, backward-compatible with all previous v3.1.0+ releases. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

Upgrade guide from v3.0+ to v3.1+ can be found at [upgrade 3.1](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/upgrades/upgrade_3_1.md).

The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key).
 
##### Bug fixes
 
- [#5386#issuecomment](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/5386#issuecomment-302465556),[#8074](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/8074) rafthttp: permit very large v2 snapshots
 
##### Getting started
 
###### Linux
 
```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.1.9
 
# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
rm -rf /tmp/test-etcd && mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xzvf /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -C /tmp/test-etcd --strip-components=1

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version
<<COMMENT
etcd Version: 3.1.9
Git SHA: 0f4a535
Go Version: go1.7.6
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
COMMENT
 
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl version
<<COMMENT
etcdctl version: 3.1.9
API version: 3.1
COMMENT
```
 
```bash
# start a local etcd server
/tmp/test-etcd/etcd
 
# write,read to etcd
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 put foo bar
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 get foo
```
 
###### macOS (Darwin)
 
```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.1.9
 
# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
rm -rf /tmp/test-etcd && mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
unzip /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -d /tmp
mv /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64/* /tmp/test-etcd

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version

```
 
###### Docker
 
```
docker run \
  --rm \
  -p 2379:2379 \
  -p 2380:2380 \
  --name etcd-v3.1.9 \
  --volume=/tmp/etcd-data:/etcd-data \
  quay.io/coreos/etcd:v3.1.9 \
  /usr/local/bin/etcd \
  --name my-etcd-1 \
  --data-dir /etcd-data \
  --listen-client-urls http://localhost:2379 \
  --advertise-client-urls http://localhost:2379 \
  --listen-peer-urls http://localhost:2380 \
  --initial-advertise-peer-urls http://localhost:2380 \
  --initial-cluster my-etcd-1=http://localhost:2380 \
  --initial-cluster-token my-etcd-token \
  --initial-cluster-state new \
  --auto-compaction-retention 1
 
docker exec etcd-v3.1.9 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcd -version"
docker exec etcd-v3.1.9 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl version"
docker exec etcd-v3.1.9 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl endpoint health"

docker exec etcd-v3.1.9 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl get --consistency=s foo"
```

For more details, please check [Docker guide](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/container.md#docker).

name: v3.2.0-rc.1
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.2.0-rc.1, as part of etcd v3.2 release process.

Please try and report any bugs to help stabilize the v3.2 release.

Upgrade guide from v3.1+ to v3.2+ can be found at [upgrade 3.2](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/upgrades/upgrade_3_2.md).

The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key/).

##### Breaking changes

[#7305](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7305) lease: LeaseTimeToLive returns TTL=-1 resp on lease not found
[#7879](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7879) embed: Etcd.Peers field is now []*peerListener

##### Reverted changes from v3.2.0-rc.0

[#7488](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7488),[#7732](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7732) clientv3: never return an error for KeepAlive
[#7851](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7851),[#7852](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7852) Revert "clientv3: never return an error for KeepAlive"
[#7853](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7853) Documentation/upgrades: revert KeepAlive interface change

##### Security changes

[#7524](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7524) auth: changes of managing roles and users
[#7687](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7687) transport: deny incoming peer certs with wrong IP SAN
[#7767](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7767) transport: resolve DNSNames when SAN checking
[#7829](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7829) pkg/transport: reload TLS certificates for every client requests

##### Other changes

[#7745](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7745) *: add bill of materials
[#6174](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/6174) *: use Go 1.8+
[#7560](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7560) Dockerfile-release: add nsswitch.conf into image
[#7714](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7714) *: add multi-arch support in release binaries
[#7170](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7170) embed: make v2 endpoint optional
[#7524](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7525) etcdserver, backend: configure mmap size based on quota
[#7752](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7752) clientv3: translate WithPrefix() into WithFromKey() for empty key
[#7692](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7692) vendor: upgrade grpc to 1.2.1
[#7695](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7695) vendor: upgrade grpc-gateway to v1.2.0
[#7846](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7846) scripts: annotate with acbuild with supports-systemd-notify
[#7877](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7877) backend: print snapshotting duration warning every 30s
[#7892](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7892) backend: add prometheus metric for large snapshot duration

##### Notable bug fixes

[#7515](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7515),[#7518](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7518) *: use filepath.Join (fix for Windows)
[#7322](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7322),[#7743](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7743) *: use gRPC server GracefulStop
[#7724](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7724),[#7759](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7759) *: simply ignore ErrAuthNotEnabled in clientv3 if auth is not enabled
[#7880](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7880),[#7890](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7890) clientv3: Do no stop keep alive loop by server side errors
[#7348](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7348),[#7394](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7394) *: use machine default host only for default value, 0.0.0.0
[#7834](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7834),[#7856](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7856) etcdserver: apply() sets consistIndex for any entry type
[#7628](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7628),[#7876](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7876) etcdserver: renaming db happens before snapshot persists to wal and snap files

##### New features

[#7676](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7676) etcdmain: support SRV discovery for gRPC proxy
[#7733](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7733) clientv3: let client dial endpoints not in the balancer
[#7342](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7342) clientv3: version checking
[#7649](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7649) etcdctl: add a new option --open-ended for unlimited range permission
[#7591](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7591) etcdctl: add initial check perf command
[#7221](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7221) grpcproxy: support lease coalescing
[#7549](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7549) namespace proxy
[#4709](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/4709),[#7634](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7634) Election RPC service, embedded client
[#4378](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/4378),[#7882](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7882) gateway: DNS SRV priority

##### Enhancements

[#7083](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7083),[#7105](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7105) mvcc: don't block on concurrent reads

##### Getting started

###### Linux

```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.0-rc.1

# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
rm -rf /tmp/test-etcd && mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
```

name: v3.1.8
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.1.8. This is primarily a bug fix release, backward-compatible with all previous v3.1.0+ releases. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key/).

##### Bug fixes

[#7834](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7834),[#7856](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7856) etcdserver: apply() sets consistIndex for any entry type

##### Documentation fixes

[#7667](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7667) Docs: replace absolute links with relative ones
[#7578](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7578) etcd-2-1-0-bench: Fix an absolute bare link to resource outside of Doc dir
[#7871](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7871) *: fix broken links in markdown

name: v3.2.0-rc.0
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.2.0-rc.0, as part of etcd v3.2 release process.

Please try and report any bugs to help stabilize the v3.2 release.

Upgrade guide from v3.1.x to v3.2.x can be found at [upgrade 3.2](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/upgrades/upgrade_3_2.md).

The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key/).

##### Breaking changes

[#7305](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7305) lease: LeaseTimeToLive returns TTL=-1 resp on lease not found
[#7488](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7488),[#7732](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7732) clientv3: never return an error for KeepAlive

##### Security changes

[#7524](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7524) auth: changes of managing roles and users
[#7687](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7687) transport: deny incoming peer certs with wrong IP SAN
[#7767](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7767) transport: resolve DNSNames when SAN checking
[#7829](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7829) pkg/transport: reload TLS certificates for every client requests

##### Other changes

[#6174](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/6174) *: use Go 1.8+
[#7560](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7560) Dockerfile-release: add nsswitch.conf into image
[#7714](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7714) *: add multi-arch support in release binaries
[#7170](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7170) embed: make v2 endpoint optional
[#7524](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7525) etcdserver, backend: configure mmap size based on quota
[#7752](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7752) clientv3: translate WithPrefix() into WithFromKey() for empty key
[#7692](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7692) vendor: upgrade grpc to 1.2.1
[#7695](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7695) vendor: upgrade grpc-gateway to v1.2.0
[#7846](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7846) scripts: annotate with acbuild with supports-systemd-notify

##### Bug fixes

[#7322](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7322),[#7743](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7743) *: use gRPC server GracefulStop
[#7724](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7724),[#7759](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7759) *: simply ignore ErrAuthNotEnabled in clientv3 if auth is not enabled
[#7348](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7348),[#7394](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7394) *: use machine default host only for default value, 0.0.0.0

##### New features

[#7676](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7676) etcdmain: support SRV discovery for gRPC proxy
[#7733](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7733) clientv3: let client dial endpoints not in the balancer
[#7342](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7342) clientv3: version checking
[#7649](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7649) etcdctl: add a new option --open-ended for unlimited range permission
[#7591](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7591) etcdctl: add initial check perf command
[#7221](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7221) grpcproxy: support lease coalescing
[#7549](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7549) namespace proxy
[#4709](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/4709),[#7634](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7634) Election RPC service, embedded client

##### Enhancements

[#7083](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/7083),[#7105](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7105) mvcc: don't block on concurrent reads

##### Getting started

###### Linux

```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.2.0-rc.0

# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
rm -rf /tmp/test-etcd && mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xzvf /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -C /tmp/test-etcd --strip-components=1

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version
<<COMMENT
etcd Version: 3.2.0-rc.0
Git SHA: 7e6d876
Go Version: go1.8.1
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
COMMENT

ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl version
<<COMMENT
etcdctl version: 3.2.0-rc.0
API version: 3.2
COMMENT
```

```bash
# start a local etcd server
/tmp/test-etcd/etcd

# write,read to etcd
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 put foo bar
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 get foo
```

```bash
curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
unzip /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -d /tmp
mv /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64/* /tmp/test-etcd

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version

```

###### Docker

```
    --name etcd-v3.2.0-rc.0 \
    --volume=/tmp/etcd-data:/etcd-data \
    quay.io/coreos/etcd:v3.2.0-rc.0 \
    /usr/local/bin/etcd \
    --name my-etcd-1 \
    --data-dir /etcd-data \
    --listen-client-urls http://0.0.0.0:2379 \
    --advertise-client-urls http://0.0.0.0:2379 \
    --listen-peer-urls http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
    --initial-advertise-peer-urls http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
    --initial-cluster my-etcd-1=http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
    --initial-cluster-token my-etcd-token \
    --initial-cluster-state new \
    --auto-compaction-retention 1

docker exec etcd-v3.2.0-rc.0 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcd -version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.0-rc.0 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl version"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.0-rc.0 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl endpoint health"

docker exec etcd-v3.2.0-rc.0 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl put foo bar"
docker exec etcd-v3.2.0-rc.0 /bin/sh -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl get --consistency=s foo"
```

For more details, please check [Docker guide](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/container.md#docker).

name: v3.1.6
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.1.6. This is primarily a bug fix release, backward-compatible with all previous v3.1.0+ releases. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key/).

##### Bug fixes

[#7639](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7639) clientv3: respect dial timeout in auth
[#7659](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7659) pkg/transport: remove port in Certificate.IPAddresses
[#7729](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7729) auth: protect simpleToken with single mutex and check if enabled
[#7734](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7734) etcdserver: let Status() not require authentication
[#7744](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7744) auth: fix race on stopping simple token keeper
[#7753](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7753) etcdserver: fill-in Auth API Header in apply layer
[#7775](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7775) ctlv3: keep lease as integer in fields printer

##### Getting started

###### Linux

```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.1.6
```

name: v3.1.5
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.1.5. This is primarily a bug fix release, backward-compatible with all previous v3.1.0+ releases. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key/).

##### Bug fixes

[#7515](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7515) wal: use path/filepath instead of path
[#7518](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7518) *: replace path.Join on files with filepath.Join
[#7560](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7560) Dockerfile-release: add nsswitch.conf into image
[#7574](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7574) raft: use rs.req.Entries[0].Data as the key for deletion in advance()
[#7582](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7582) clientv3: use waitgroup to wait for substream goroutine teardown

##### Getting started

###### Linux

```bash
ETCD_VER=v3.1.5

# choose either URL
GOOGLE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/etcd
GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
DOWNLOAD_URL=${GOOGLE_URL}

rm -f /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
rm -rf /tmp/test-etcd && mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xzvf /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -C /tmp/test-etcd --strip-components=1

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version
<<COMMENT
etcd Version: 3.1.5
Git SHA: 20490ca
Go Version: go1.7.5
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
COMMENT

ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl version
<<COMMENT
etcdctl version: 3.1.5
API version: 3.1
COMMENT
```

```bash
# start a local etcd server
/tmp/test-etcd/etcd

# write,read to etcd
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 put foo bar
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 get foo
```

###### macOS (Darwin)

```bash

# choose either URL
```

###### Docker

name: v3.1.4
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.1.4. This is primarily a bug fix release, backward-compatible with all previous v3.1.0+ releases. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

The release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key/).

##### Bug fixes

- [#7479](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7479) auth: nil check AuthInfo when checking admin permissions
- [#7492](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7492) auth: get rid of deadlocking channel passing scheme in simpleTokenTTL
- [#7499](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7499) ctlv3: ensure synced member list before printing env vars on member add
- [#7504](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7504) clientv3: close open watch channel if substream is closing on reconnect
- [#7513](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7513) etcdserver: remove possibly compacted entry look-up
- [#7517](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7517) embed: Delay setting initial cluster
- [#7546](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7546) *: fix blocking etcd process
- [#7553](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7553) backend: add FillPercent option

##### Other

- [#7482](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7482) discovery: fix print format
- [#7539](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7539) ctlv3: have "protobuf" in output help string instead of "proto"

- [GH7457](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7457): lease: guard 'Lease.itemSet' from concurrent writes

name: v3.1.2
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.1.2. This is primarily a bug fix release, backward-compatible with all previous v3.1.0+ releases. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

Release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key/).

##### Bug fixes
- [GH7199](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7199): pkg/netutil: use native byte ordering
- [GH7256](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7256): netutil: add dualstack to linux_route
- [GH7270](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7270): pkg/netutil: name GetDefaultInterfaces consistent
- [GH7368](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7368): netutil: use ipv4 host by default
- [GH7332](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7332): raft: fix read index request
- [GH7361](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7361): tcpproxy: don't use range variable in reactivate goroutine
- [GH7363](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7363): clientv3: do not set next keepalive time <= now+TTL
- [GH7364](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7364): auth: keep old revision in 'NewAuthStore'

```
DOWNLOAD_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd && unzip /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -d /tmp && mv /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64/* /tmp/test-etcd

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version
```

###### Docker

```
docker run --net=host \
    --name etcd-v2.3.8 \
    --volume=/tmp/etcd-data:/etcd-data \
    quay.io/coreos/etcd:v2.3.8 \
    /usr/local/bin/etcd \
    --name my-etcd-1 \
    --data-dir /etcd-data \
    --listen-client-urls http://0.0.0.0:2379 \
    --advertise-client-urls http://0.0.0.0:2379 \
    --listen-peer-urls http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
    --initial-advertise-peer-urls http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
    --initial-cluster my-etcd-1=http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
    --initial-cluster-token my-etcd-token \
    --initial-cluster-state new

docker exec etcd-v2.3.8 /bin/sh -c "/usr/local/bin/etcd -version"
docker exec etcd-v2.3.8 /bin/sh -c "/usr/local/bin/etcdctl version"

docker exec etcd-v2.3.8 /bin/sh -c "/usr/local/bin/etcdctl set foo bar"
docker exec etcd-v2.3.8 /bin/sh -c "/usr/local/bin/etcdctl get foo"
```

For more details, please check [Docker guide](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/container.md#docker).

name: v3.1.0
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.1.0, backward-compatible with all previous v3.0.0+ releases.
For the 3.1 release, we focused on fixing bugs and reducing issue backlog. Besides that, we introduced a number of new features.

Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

Release signing key can be found at [coreos.com/security/app-signing-key](https://coreos.com/security/app-signing-key/).

##### New features
- [GH6038](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6038): api: transfer leadership when stopping leader
- [GH6321](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6321): api: lease timetolive
- [GH6330](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6330): clientv3: add SetEndpoints method
- [GH6474](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6474): clientv3: add 'Sync' method
- [GH6273](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6273): ctlv3: add 'print-value-only' flag to get command
- [GH6439](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6439): etcdctl/ctlv3: make-mirror: feature add to modify/remove prefix in dest cluster
- [GH6799](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6799): etcdmain: configurable 'etcd' binary log-output
- [GH7030](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7030): etcdmain: add '--metrics' option to support different level of metrics reporting
- [GH6172](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6172): clientv3/concurrency: remove session manager and add ttl
- experimental gRPC proxy; see [gRPC proxy](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/grpc_proxy.md) for more detail

##### Notable changes
- [GH6106](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6106): etcdserver, embed: stricter reconfig checking
- [GH6156](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6156): etcdserver: reject member removal that breaks active quorum
- [GH6170](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6170): use default ip for advertise URL
- [GH6629](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6629): clientv3: drop Config.Logger field
- [GH6672](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6672): *: sort by ASCEND by default when missing sort order
- [GH6653](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6653): acbuild: add symlinks to /usr/local/bin/etcd*

##### Security changes
- [GH6084](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6084): etcdctl: set TLS servername on discovery
- [GH7145](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7145): transport: warn on user-provided CA

##### Bug fix
- [GH6649](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6649): discovery: add upper limit for waiting on a retry
- [GH5845](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/5845): clientv3: respect up/down notifications from grpc
- [GH6077](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6077): v2http: use guest access in non-TLS mode
- [GH6166](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6166): clientv3: support non-blocking New()
- [GH6253](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6253): discovery: reject IP address records in SRVGetCluster
- [GH6365](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6365): embed: reject domain names before binding
- [GH6888](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6888): Use monotonic time in lease
- [GH7023](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7023): clientv3: fix lease "freezing" on unhealthy cluster
- [GH7148](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7148): clientv3: don't reset stream on keepaliveonce or revoke failure
- [GH7195](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7195): concurrency: fix stm restart on concurrent key deletion
- [GH7203](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/7203): etcdctlv3: snapshot restore works with lease key

##### Enhancements
- [GH6543](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6543): etcdserver: use linearizableReadNotify for txn

There are over 10 minor bug fixes, please check git history for more details.

##### Getting started

###### Linux

```
ETCD_VER=v3.1.0
DOWNLOAD_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd && tar xzvf /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -C /tmp/test-etcd --strip-components=1

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version

Git SHA: 8ba2897
Go Version: go1.7.4
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
```

```
# start a local etcd server
/tmp/test-etcd/etcd

# write,read to etcd
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 put foo "bar"
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 get foo
```

###### Mac OS (Darwin)

```
ETCD_VER=v3.1.0
DOWNLOAD_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd && unzip /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -d /tmp && mv /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64/* /tmp/test-etcd

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version
```

##### Run in containers

###### rkt

```
RKT_VERSION=v1.23.0

GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/rkt/releases/download

DOWNLOAD_URL=${GITHUB_URL}

rm -f /tmp/rkt-${RKT_VERSION}.tar.gz
rm -rf /tmp/test-rkt-${RKT_VERSION} && mkdir -p /tmp/test-rkt-${RKT_VERSION}

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${RKT_VERSION}/rkt-${RKT_VERSION}.tar.gz -o /tmp/rkt-${RKT_VERSION}.tar.gz
tar xzvf /tmp/rkt-${RKT_VERSION}.tar.gz -C /tmp/test-rkt-${RKT_VERSION} --strip-components=1

# sudo cp /tmp/test-rkt-${RKT_VERSION}/rkt /usr/local/bin
sudo cp /tmp/test-rkt-${RKT_VERSION}/rkt /

/rkt version


sudo /rkt \
    --trust-keys-from-https \
    run \
    --stage1-name coreos.com/rkt/stage1-fly:1.23.0 \
    quay.io/coreos/etcd:v3.1.0 \
    --exec=/bin/sh -- -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl version"

sudo rm -rf /tmp/etcd-data
sudo mkdir -p /tmp/etcd-data
sudo chown -R root:$(whoami) /tmp/etcd-data
sudo chmod -R a+rw /tmp/etcd-data

sudo /rkt \
    --trust-keys-from-https \
    run \
    --stage1-name coreos.com/rkt/stage1-fly:1.23.0 \
    --net=host \
    --volume etcd-data-dir,kind=host,source=/tmp/etcd-data \
    --mount volume=etcd-data-dir,target=/tmp/etcd-data \
    quay.io/coreos/etcd:v3.1.0 -- \
    --name my-etcd-1 \
    --data-dir /tmp/etcd-data \
    --listen-client-urls http://localhost:2379 \
    --advertise-client-urls http://localhost:2379 \
    --listen-peer-urls http://localhost:2380 \
    --initial-advertise-peer-urls http://localhost:2380 \
    --initial-cluster my-etcd-1=http://localhost:2380 \
    --initial-cluster-token my-etcd-token \
    --initial-cluster-state new \
    --auto-compaction-retention 1

sudo /rkt \
    --trust-keys-from-https \
    run \
    --stage1-name coreos.com/rkt/stage1-fly:1.23.0 \
    quay.io/coreos/etcd:v3.1.0 \
    --exec=/bin/sh -- -c "export ETCDCTL_API=3 && /usr/local/bin/etcdctl put foo bar"
```

For more details, please check [rkt commands](https://github.com/coreos/rkt/blob/master/Documentation/commands.md#rkt-run).

###### Docker

```
docker run --name etcd quay.io/coreos/etcd:v3.1.0
```

For more details, please check [Docker guide](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/container.md#docker).

Today we're announcing etcd v3.0.16. This is primarily a bug fix release, backward-compatible with all previous v3.0.0+ releases. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

name: v3.1.0-rc.1
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.1.0-rc.1, as part of etcd v3.1 release process.

Please try the alpha and report any bugs to help stabilize the v3.1 release.

Some highlights of what’s new in etcd 3.1:

V3 features:
- gRPC smart proxy with watch coalescing and key caching
- Authentication
- Lease information lookup RPC
- Automatic client endpoint synchronization to cluster

General server features:
- Faster linearizable reads
- Server gateway for static client endpoints
- Automatic cluster leadership transfer on server shutdown
- Membership health checking to prevent accidental quorum loss
- Embeddable etcd server

Complete release notes for 3.1 will be bundled with the 3.1 general release.

##### Getting started

###### Linux

```
ETCD_VER=v3.1.0-rc.1
DOWNLOAD_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd && tar xzvf /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -C /tmp/test-etcd --strip-components=1

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version

Git SHA: 3d5ba43
Go Version: go1.7.3
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
```

```
# start a local etcd server
/tmp/test-etcd/etcd

# write,read to etcd
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 put foo "bar"
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 get foo
```

```
curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd && unzip /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -d /tmp && mv /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64/* /tmp/test-etcd

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version
```

##### Run in containers

###### ACI / rkt

```
RKT_VERSION=v1.19.0

GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/rkt/releases/download

DOWNLOAD_URL=${GITHUB_URL}

rm -f /tmp/rkt-${RKT_VERSION}.tar.gz
rm -rf /tmp/test-rkt-${RKT_VERSION} && mkdir -p /tmp/test-rkt-${RKT_VERSION}

tar xzvf /tmp/rkt-${RKT_VERSION}.tar.gz -C /tmp/test-rkt-${RKT_VERSION} --strip-components=1

# sudo cp /tmp/test-rkt-${RKT_VERSION}/rkt /usr/local/bin

/rkt version

sudo /rkt \
    --trust-keys-from-https \
    --dir=/var/lib/rkt \
    run \
    --stage1-name coreos.com/rkt/stage1-fly:1.19.0 \
    --net=host \
    --volume data-dir,kind=host,source=/tmp \
    coreos.com/etcd:v3.1.0-rc.1 -- \
    --name my-etcd-1 \
    --listen-client-urls http://localhost:2379 \
    --advertise-client-urls http://localhost:2379 \
    --listen-peer-urls http://localhost:2380 \
    --initial-advertise-peer-urls http://localhost:2380 \
    --initial-cluster my-etcd-1=http://localhost:2380 \
    --initial-cluster-token my-etcd-token \
```

name: v3.0.15
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.0.15. This is primarily a bug fix release, backward-compatible with all previous v3.0.0+ releases. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

##### Bug fixes
- [GH6816](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6816): clientv3: let watchers cancel when reconnecting
- [GH6820](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6820): mvcc: return -1 for wrong watcher range key >= end

##### Getting started

###### Linux

```
ETCD_VER=v3.0.15
DOWNLOAD_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd && tar xzvf /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -C /tmp/test-etcd --strip-components=1

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version

Git SHA: fc00305
Go Version: go1.6.3
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
```

```
# start a local etcd server
/tmp/test-etcd/etcd

# write,read to etcd
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 put foo "bar"
ETCDCTL_API=3 /tmp/test-etcd/etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 get foo
```

###### Mac OS (Darwin)

```
ETCD_VER=v3.0.15
DOWNLOAD_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip
mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd && unzip /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -d /tmp && mv /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64/* /tmp/test-etcd

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version
```

##### Run in containers

###### ACI / rkt

```
RKT_VERSION=v1.19.0

GITHUB_URL=https://github.com/coreos/rkt/releases/download

DOWNLOAD_URL=${GITHUB_URL}

rm -f /tmp/rkt-${RKT_VERSION}.tar.gz
rm -rf /tmp/test-rkt-${RKT_VERSION} && mkdir -p /tmp/test-rkt-${RKT_VERSION}

curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${RKT_VERSION}/rkt-${RKT_VERSION}.tar.gz -o /tmp/rkt-${RKT_VERSION}.tar.gz
tar xzvf /tmp/rkt-${RKT_VERSION}.tar.gz -C /tmp/test-rkt-${RKT_VERSION} --strip-components=1

# sudo cp /tmp/test-rkt-${RKT_VERSION}/rkt /usr/local/bin
sudo cp /tmp/test-rkt-${RKT_VERSION}/rkt /

/rkt version

sudo /rkt \
    --trust-keys-from-https \
    --dir=/var/lib/rkt \
    run \
    --stage1-name coreos.com/rkt/stage1-fly:1.19.0 \
    --net=host \
    --volume data-dir,kind=host,source=/tmp \
    coreos.com/etcd:v3.0.15 -- \
    --name my-etcd-1 \
    --listen-client-urls http://localhost:2379 \
    --advertise-client-urls http://localhost:2379 \
    --listen-peer-urls http://localhost:2380 \
    --initial-advertise-peer-urls http://localhost:2380 \
    --initial-cluster my-etcd-1=http://localhost:2380 \
    --initial-cluster-token my-etcd-token \
    --initial-cluster-state new
```

For more details, please check [rkt commands](https://github.com/coreos/rkt/blob/master/Documentation/commands.md#rkt-run).

###### Docker

```
docker run --name etcd quay.io/coreos/etcd:v3.0.15
```

For more details, please check [Docker guide](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/container.md#docker).

name: v3.1.0-rc.0
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.1.0-rc.0, as part of etcd v3.1 release process.

Please try the alpha and report any bugs to help stabilize the v3.1 release.

Some highlights of what’s new in etcd 3.1:

V3 features:
- gRPC smart proxy with watch coalescing and key caching
- Authentication
- Lease information lookup RPC
- Automatic client endpoint synchronization to cluster

General server features:
- Faster linearizable reads
- Server gateway for static client endpoints
- Automatic cluster leadership transfer on server shutdown
- Membership health checking to prevent accidental quorum loss
- Embeddable etcd server

Complete release notes for 3.1 will be bundled with the 3.1 general release.

##### Getting started

###### Linux

```
ETCD_VER=v3.1.0-rc.0
DOWNLOAD_URL=https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download
curl -L ${DOWNLOAD_URL}/${ETCD_VER}/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd && tar xzvf /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-linux-amd64.tar.gz -C /tmp/test-etcd --strip-components=1

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version

Git SHA: 8334790
Go Version: go1.7.1
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
```

```
# start a local etcd server
./etcd

# write,read to etcd
ETCDCTL_API=3 ./etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 put foo "bar"
ETCDCTL_API=3 ./etcdctl --endpoints=localhost:2379 get foo
```

###### Mac OS (Darwin)

```
mkdir -p /tmp/test-etcd && unzip /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64.zip -d /tmp && mv /tmp/etcd-${ETCD_VER}-darwin-amd64 /tmp/test-etcd

/tmp/test-etcd/etcd --version
```

###### ACI / rkt

name: v3.0.11
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.0.11. This is primarily a bug fix release, backward-compatible with all previous v3.0.0+ releases. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

##### New features
- [GH5880](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/5880): add options to return prev_kv

##### Bug fixes
- [GH6525](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6525): clientv3: simplify watcher synchronization
- [GH6544](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6544): wal, ioutil: set page offset for encoder
- [GH6550](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6550): clientv3: make IsProgressNotify() false on compact event and closed channel
- [GH6582](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6582): clientv3: only return closing error to watcher if context is not canceled
- [GH6587](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6587): clientv3: fix race on watch initial revision

- [GH6404](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6404): etcd/auth: fix range handling bugs
- [GH6412](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6412): embed: warn on domain name in listener

name: v3.0.7
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.0.7. This is primarily a bug fix release, backward-compatible with all previous v3.0.0+ releases. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

##### Bug fixes
- [GH6253](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6253): discovery: reject IP address records in SRVGetCluster
- [GH6267](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6267): wal: fix CRC corruption on writes following write tears
- [GH6269](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6269): wal: On non-Windows OS, hold file lock while renaming WAL directory
- [GH6284](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6284): clientv3/concurrency: fix unintended deadlock on key prefixes
- [GH6309](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6309): etcdserver: allow zero kv index for cluster upgrade
- [GH6310](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6310): wal: use page buffered writer for writing records

name: v3.0.5
body:
Today we're announcing etcd v3.0.5. This is primarily a bug fix release, backward-compatible with all previous v3.0.0+ releases. Please read [NEWS](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/blob/master/NEWS) for highlighted changes.

##### Bug fixes
- [GH5845](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/5845): clientv3: respect up/down notifications from grpc
- [GH6077](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6077): v2http: use guest access in non-TLS mode
- [GH6136](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6136): clientv3: close watcher stream once all watchers detach
- [GH6142](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6142): clientv3: handle watchGrpcStream shutdown if prior to goroutine start
- [GH6152](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6152): mvcc: fix count
- [GH6166](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6166): clientv3: support non-blocking New()
- [GH6222](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6222): integration: NewClusterV3() should launch cluster before creating clients

##### Security changes
- [GH6084](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6084): etcdctl: set TLS servername on discovery

##### Other changes
- [GH6218](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/pull/6218): vendor: boltdb/bolt v1.3.0 for Go 1.7

###### Linux

```
curl -L https://github.com/coreos/etcd/releases/download/v3.0.5/etcd-v3.0.5-linux-amd64.tar.gz -o etcd-v3.0.5-linux-amd64.tar.gz
```
